summary: This is my version of Breezehome, more elegant and illuminated, whit decoration representing whiterun and the companions guild.
descriptionHtml:
First sorry for my english

This is my version of Breezehome, more elegant and illuminated, whit decoration representing whiterun and the companions guild.

Added:
Whiterun banners
Companion banners
Ysgramor statue
Nordic Chest
3 Bookshelves
5 mannequins (I added 2 whiterun guard complete armor and 2 wolf companion complete armor if you like use whit the mannequins)
Talos and Mara temples
Elegant touch ;-)

Advertisement:
This mod change al the containers in breezehome, before use the mod, please, take all yours things out of the house and then use this mod

Bug: If you found someone, please tell me and y will try to fix.

Recommended: For fix the vanilla interior illumination - Shadow Striping Fix http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8043

If you prefer Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=79418604
author: FelixMMV
